Detailed Description

Dynamic hardware lights class.

This class holds information on dynamic hardware lights. When a dynamic object receives a FLY_OBJMESSAGE_ILLUM message it adds the light parameters to this class with the 'add_light' method. When rendering, it calls the 'init_draw' method before drawing the mesh to get the hardware lights in place. After finishing the render it calls 'end_draw' to reset the hardware lights.
